RawLine: TNPC_08005154,替我準備好{color=#FF0000}不會謝的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不膩的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生蟲的糖{/color}。,替我准备好{color=#FF0000}不会谢的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不腻的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生虫的糖{/color}。

Items.r: 替我準備好{color=#FF0000}不會謝的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不膩的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生蟲的糖{/color}。
Items.c: 替我準備好不會謝的花、喝不膩的酒、不生蟲的糖。
Items.mt: Prepare for me flowers that won't give up, wine that won't get tired of drinking, and sugar that won't get wormed.

Items.r: 替我准备好{color=#FF0000}不会谢的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不腻的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生虫的糖{/color}。
